revised_title: Energy and Momentum in General Relativity: Axial Symmetry and Gravitational Waves
tldr: The authors apply a theory to the axi-symmetric solution of the general relativity field equations for an isolated system generating gravitational waves. They find that the total energy of the system agrees with the definition of mass adopted by Bondi, van der Burg, and Metzner, and they provide an expression for the total momentum along the axis of symmetry.
